title: Cups of Apple with Walnuts
ingredients: 2 bags of Yummi Nuts Peanuts with Salt
instructions: Step 1: Place the well-crushed biscuits in the base of the glass.
Step 2: In a bowl, mix the apple with the mixed nuts and cinnamon.
Step 3: Now add the apple mixture to the glass.
Step 4: Place a spoonful of yogurt on top and our Healthy Snack glass is ready.
